name: Graveyard Walk
description:
You enjoy your daily walks through the cemetery but one night you find you're not alone. Are these denizens of the graveyard friend or foe?

Content warnings: Scary content, sudden noises, mental health topics, some swearing

Created by:

Art, Writing, Scripting: Michelle Juett

Editing help and support from: Jeremiah Johnson and Ray Pencil. Additional QA from Jeff Ingraham and Gabe Cazares.

Music and Sound from the Unity Asset Store and Freesounds.org: Anthon, SITIAN, Matthew Anett, Nox_Sound, Profi Developers, and Mr_Alden

Developed in Unity with Fungus

Notes and known issues: There is no saving in this game or limit on character name so please keep names under 12 characters when playing to avoid any issues. :) The enter name field shows up at the start before the splash screens, but please ignore this.

While I'm a Seattle-based game developer, this is my first time scripting a game on my own, first time building a game in Unity with Fungus, and my first complete visual novel! I got a late start so I spent about a week making this game. I hope you enjoy!

Estimated Play Time: 10-20 minutes, 3 possible endings, custom player name though player portrait is femme
